title: Canticle of Prayer

lyrics.text:
We do not know how to pray as we ought,
but the Spirit intercedes for us
with sighs too deep for words.

We do not know how to pray as we ought,
but the Spirit intercedes for us
with sighs too deep for words.

For all who ask receive,
and all who seek find,
and to those who knock it will be opened.

We do not know how to pray as we ought,
but the Spirit intercedes for us
with sighs too deep for words.

text_copyright: Adapt. from The Revised Standard Version of the Bible © 1946, 1952, 1973
